attributes.action: funding for single parents for full time education so we can get decent jobs to support our family
attributes.additional_details: single parents/family's that want to get an education to better yourself and your family but cant because you cant get an funding or help while in full time education which means no income coming in to support your family, the government want us to get jobs, but the ones we want to do we cant get an education for! we need 500,000 signatures for anyone to take notice and to be heard! there isn't enough jobs, so let us get an education for the jobs that are available and fund us so we can do this to give our children a brighter future.!
